agentAbility.name: Fireworks
agentAbility.description: Ember calls in an APS Turret drop at a designated location, then rushes to her allies with Haste as the turret intercepts incoming shells.

primaryAttack.name: Autocannon
primaryAttack.description: Fires small-caliber armor-piercing rounds lethal to light armored vehicles. Effective against flying vessels.

tankAbilities.name: Repair Welder
tankAbilities.description: Switch to the repair boom crane on the BAT-4M. Using overheat mechanics, this welder will rapidly heal friendly vehicles in its short range. When used on enemy vehicles, they will take damage over time. The range is very limited, and requires the vehicle to be in close proximity of its target.

tankAbilities.name: Deploy Dozer
tankAbilities.description: Deploys a dozer to protect the front of the vehicle. Heavily reinforced, it has strong armor, but reduces mobility.
